targets.rawSql:
SELECT observed_at, temperature 
FROM temperatures 
WHERE room = $room 
ORDER BY observed_at DESC 
LIMIT 1

SELECT observed_at, humidity 
FROM temperatures 
WHERE room = $room 
ORDER BY observed_at DESC 
LIMIT 1

SELECT 
  observed_at as time,
  temperature as value,
  room as metric
FROM temperatures
WHERE $__timeFilter(observed_at) and ROOM = ANY(ARRAY[$room]::varchar[])
ORDER BY observed_at ASC

SELECT 
  observed_at as time,
  humidity as value,
  room as metric
FROM temperatures
WHERE $__timeFilter(observed_at) and ROOM = ANY(ARRAY[$room]::varchar[])
    AND room != 'garden'
ORDER BY observed_at ASC

SELECT
    time_bucket('24 hour', observed_at) AS period,
    MIN(temperature) AS min,
    AVG(temperature) as avg,
    MAX(temperature) as max
FROM temperatures
WHERE room = ANY(ARRAY[$room]::varchar[])
    AND room != 'garden'
GROUP BY period;

SELECT
    time_bucket('24 hour', observed_at) AS period,
    MIN(humidity) AS min,
    AVG(humidity) as avg,
    MAX(humidity) as max
FROM temperatures
WHERE room = ANY(ARRAY[$room]::varchar[])
    AND room != 'garden'
GROUP BY period;

SELECT
    time_bucket('1 week', observed_at) AS period,
    MIN(temperature) AS min,
    AVG(temperature) as avg,
    MAX(temperature) as max
FROM temperatures
WHERE room = ANY(ARRAY[$room]::varchar[])
    AND room != 'garden'
GROUP BY period;

SELECT
    time_bucket('1 week', observed_at) AS period,
    MIN(humidity) AS min,
    AVG(humidity) as avg,
    MAX(humidity) as max
FROM temperatures
WHERE room = ANY(ARRAY[$room]::varchar[])
    AND room != 'garden'
GROUP BY period;

SELECT
    COALESCE(
            MAX(current_summ_delivered) - MIN(current_summ_delivered)
        , 0) as today_total_delivered
FROM power
WHERE DATE(observed_at) = CURRENT_DATE;

SELECT
    COALESCE(
            MAX(current_summ_delivered) - MIN(current_summ_delivered)
        , 0) / 1000 * 0.17686 as power_cost
FROM power
WHERE DATE(observed_at) = CURRENT_DATE;

WITH days AS (
    SELECT
        generate_series(
                        CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '6 days',
                        CURRENT_DATE,
                        '1 day'::interval
        )::date as consumption_date
),
     daily_consumption AS (
         SELECT
             DATE(observed_at) as consumption_date,
             COALESCE(
                     MAX(current_summ_delivered) - MIN(current_summ_delivered)
                 , 0) as daily_consumption
         FROM power
         WHERE DATE(observed_at) > CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days'
           AND DATE(observed_at) <= CURRENT_DATE
         GROUP BY DATE(observed_at)
     )
SELECT
    d.consumption_date as time,
    COALESCE(dc.daily_consumption, 0) as daily_consumption
FROM days d
         LEFT JOIN daily_consumption dc USING (consumption_date)
ORDER BY d.consumption_date;

SELECT
    COALESCE(
            MAX(current_summ_delivered) - MIN(current_summ_delivered)
        , 0) as today_total_delivered
FROM power
WHERE DATE(observed_at) >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE);

SELECT
    COALESCE(
            MAX(current_summ_delivered) - MIN(current_summ_delivered)
        , 0) / 1000 * 0.17686 as power_cost
FROM power
WHERE DATE(observed_at) >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE);

WITH months AS (
    SELECT
        generate_series(
            date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE) - INTERVAL '11 months',
            date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE),
            '1 month'::interval
        )::date as consumption_month
),
     monthly_consumption AS (
         SELECT
             date_trunc('month', observed_at)::date as consumption_month,
             COALESCE(
                 MAX(current_summ_delivered) - MIN(current_summ_delivered)
             , 0) as monthly_consumption
         FROM power
         WHERE observed_at > date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE) - INTERVAL '12 months'
           AND observed_at <= CURRENT_DATE
         GROUP BY date_trunc('month', observed_at)::date
     )
SELECT
    m.consumption_month as time,
    COALESCE(mc.monthly_consumption, 0) as monthly_consumption
FROM months m
     LEFT JOIN monthly_consumption mc USING (consumption_month)
ORDER BY m.consumption_month;
